content:
Of course! Here are some funny and topical pub trivia team names inspired by current events and popular culture. Keep in mind that the appropriateness of these names may change depending on the specific time, location, and audience:

1. Quiztopher Nolan's Triviagons
2. Meme Dream Team Supreme
3. The NFT Know-It-Alls
4. Vaccination Validation Squad
5. Blockbuster Blockheads
6. The Cryptic Crypto Crew
7. Mars Rover Riddlers
8. Meta-Quiz-averse Explorers
9. Climate Changemakers
10. The Great Barrier Griefs
11. The Electric Quizla Team
12. Baby Yoda's Brainy Buddies
13. The Squid Game Strategists
14. Trivial Pursuit: Spider-Verse Edition
15. Zero-Emission Quiz Whizzes

Remember to choose a team name that's relevant, light-hearted, and respectful to the atmosphere of the event. Have fun!
